trends: There has been one other sighting in North Attleboro
There were no other sightings in North Attleboro on or around September 19th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: round light emiting white plume beneath
divs: sighting detailsdriving west on orne st @8pm crossing rt 1\ east washington st. noticed white circle of light in sky looking southwest. weather clear, no clouds. circle of light appeared to have a triangle of white beneath it as if it was coming out of the circle of light. put window down, shut off radio, continued to drive at slow pace and heard nothing, perhaps too far to hear anything. watched for several minutes, object did not appear to move. light dimmed and disappeared in 3-5 secs. white triangle shape plume beneath light faded away in 5-10 secs. nothing else noticed or unusual interested to know if there have been other events similar. thank you
